pkgmetadata.longdescription: Omics Network Exploration // Omics integration and detailed gene network exploration to identify expression patterns, prepare for pathway building, and find disease candidate genes; the package compliments research "Insights into therapeutic targets and biomarkers using integrated multi-'omics' approaches for dilated and ischemic cardiomyopathies"; Auste Kanapeckaite and Neringa Burokiene; 2021, doi:10.1093/intbio/zyab007.
